Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran scored 67 runs from 40 balls, helping West Indies reach 126-5 with 27 needed from 36 balls.
Akeal Hosein and Alzarri Joseph took West Indies across the line with late wickets, securing an eight-wicket win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Providence under steaming sunshine, watched by more than 2000 fans.
Tilak Varma scored his maiden T20 half-century for India, finishing with 51 runs from 41 balls.
